name: Reignman（掌控者）
description: "The Reignman" is a strategy card game based on exploration and fighting, the game combines the traditional RPG and Roguelike elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better DirectX: Version 6.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
